name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 13th, the second anniversary of the Sitongqiao incident
We don’t want nucleic acid, we want food; we don’t want the Cultural Revolution, we want reform
We don’t want lockdown, we want freedom; we don’t want leaders, we want votes
We don’t want lies, we want dignity; we don’t want to be slaves, we want to be citizens
Strike and remove the traitor Xi Jinping

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
College students encounter new type of part-time scams.
Recently, college students in many places have exposed a new type of part-time scam on social platforms. Scammers recruit part-time workers with daily pay in the name of telecom broadband boost, application promotion, Amazon online store registration, etc., but in fact they steal personal information, register companies in other places and issue large invoices.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Victims are often asked to provide their ID numbers, verification codes, and undergo facial recognition. After obtaining this information, the scammers quickly register a company and illegally issue invoices to cash out. The victimized students later found that their various accounts were blocked and frozen. Not only do they face time-consuming and costly company deregistration procedures, but they may also affect their personal credit and even get into legal disputes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At noon on October 12th, European time, a netizen in Germany photographed someone holding up Peng Zaizhou's banner again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, Red Star News published an article titled "31-year-old groom dies five days after 'cross-province flash marriage'". Xiao Fei got married to a Yunnan woman through a matchmaking agency 1,300 kilometers away from home, and paid a gift of 278,000 yuan in just a few days. However, shortly after the marriage, the woman asked to leave and asked for more money, leaving Xiao Fei with nothing. On September 11, Xiao Fei chose to drink pesticide to commit suicide in despair. The police investigation found that the woman had multiple marriages and a record of drug abuse, but due to legal and agreement restrictions, it was difficult to file a case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Red Star News, the family of Mr. Zhang, a Wenzhou netizen, was mistakenly involved in a money laundering case at the end of May. When handling the case, Fu, a police officer from the Hualong District Branch of the Puyang Public Security Bureau, asked his family for 3,000 yuan for travel expenses. On October 12, the Hualong District Branch issued a notice confirming the incident, and ordered Fu to return the money and suspend him from his post.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 10, Zhanjiang, Guangdong. A shopkeeper placed an electric fan at the door, and it was smashed by the "urban management" personnel. A staff member of Suixi County Urban Management and Comprehensive Law Enforcement Bureau responded: Plainclothes officers are not law enforcement officers, and the townships and towns have their own law enforcement teams, and the specific situation needs to be verified; another staff member responded: The conflict arose due to occupying the road for business, and they had persuaded the business many times.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 8, in Liaoning, a young man was talking about the stock market with the driver while riding in an online car-hailing service. The driver spoke from his own experience and advised him not to enter the stock market. It is reported that the stock market began to fall from that day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 9, a netizen posted a blog to share what he saw when taking a taxi: the driver taped a piece of paper behind the seat, which read, "This car refuses to allow Apple phones to be charged in the car. If you must charge them, a service fee of 7,000 yuan will be charged."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 11, Shanghai. A netizen posted a video saying that a taxi had a serious accident. The Hongkou Branch issued a police report: At about 11:18 on October 11, 2024, a traffic accident occurred at the intersection of Qinhuangdao Road and Pingzhang Road.
